snippet: The E.P.A. weighs various alternatives for dredging and capping toxic material in a cleanup that is expected to take a decade.
abstract: The E.P.A. weighs various alternatives for dredging and capping toxic material in a cleanup that is expected to take a decade.
lead_paragraph: The Environmental Protection Agency releases a study weighing technologies for cleaning up the Gowanus Canal, which was declared a Superfund site by the agency last year. [Environmental Protection Agency]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Dredging the Gowanus Canal
